abilities.name: Deep Sleep
abilities.effect: As long as Misdreavus is your Active Pokémon, each player flips 2 coins for his or her Pokémon that is Asleep between turns. If either coin is tails, that Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Return Trance
attacks.effect: Return an Energy card attached to Misdreavus to your hand. The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dream Eater
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.
